revised_title: Development and Metamorphosis of Pelagic Decapods: Amphion, Sergestes, and Leucifer
tldr: The author investigates the metamorphosis and development of pelagic decapods, specifically Amphion, Sergestes, and Leucifer, and provides insights into their life cycles and systematic positions. The study contributes to the understanding of these remarkable forms and their relationships within the crustacean family tree.
